data.description:
FIGHT with any weapon you can find against different enemies in the Hex7 Arenas. 
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
                                                                                                                                                                       
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031640_1611492052972544_8434024045580790583_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=U81GbV53JvwQ7kNvgHfUs4j&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDMGztXXRewnuGPji5Nf1AvKKCH4HP5QdDDVyibS7_aTQ&oe=6709200C)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game as much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-iad3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035393_1502492917145105_2500292279720560247_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=oAd-kTH0BiMQ7kNvgGrmd8X&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-1.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDFXh4pdrOKbK7HKS5db4bWEK_wIre8YHWmU2ZiJwut7Q&oe=67091E1F)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75392879_331169873202633_892518978300243902_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=q7rig5IY-AgQ7kNvgHN-Dto&_nc_ht=scontent-iad3-2.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBvrbBwQEc7MtyRrVWB-UL23uiW8uVOIeeMm5Wnbk0PUg&oe=67090371)
